backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the backend, implementing user profile management, social media post CRUD, metrics tracking, and webhook logging with role-based access control via MixinAuthorization and AccessControl mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (Smart Task Agent page, Campaign Autopilot page, AI Agent sidebar navigation) to their source files, components, and test IDs with high confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-line summaries of all frontend source files, describing the purpose and key implementation details of each page, component, hook, and utility in the frontend.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining light and dark mode CSS custom properties for the design system's color tokens, including background, foreground, primary, sidebar, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app titled 'Quick Bee AI Growth Engine', mounting the app into a root div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app router using TanStack Router, defining all application routes including pages for leads, services, analytics, social media, digital marketing, and the two new AI Agent pages (SmartTaskAgent and CampaignAutopilot).
frontend/src/components/AdCampaignFormMo: Dialog modal component for creating and editing ad campaigns, with fields for campaign name, platform, budget, spend, impressions, clicks, and conversions, supporting both create and edit modes.
frontend/src/components/AppSidebar.tsx: Renders the application sidebar with collapsible navigation groups (main, social media, digital marketing, AI agents) using TanStack Router links and highlights the active route. Also displays a cart item badge on the Checkout link using CartContext.
frontend/src/components/EmailCampaignFor: Modal dialog for creating or editing an email campaign, with fields for name, subject, body, target audience, and status. Pre-populates fields when editing an existing campaign and calls an async onSave callback on submission.
frontend/src/components/LandingPageFormM: Modal dialog for creating or editing a landing page record, with fields for name, URL, associated campaign, conversion goal, and status. Pre-populates fields from an existing LandingPage object when provided.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout component that wraps all pages with the AppSidebar and a main content area rendered via TanStack Router's Outlet. Includes a footer with a copyright notice and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/MetricsFormModal: Modal dialog for creating or editing social media metrics entries, with fields for platform, date, followers, impressions, reach, engagements, clicks, posts published, and notes. Converts between nanosecond bigint timestamps and date strings for the backend.
frontend/src/components/PostFormModal.ts: Modal dialog for creating or editing a social media post, with fields for title, caption, platform, status, scheduled datetime, tags, and notes. Handles nanosecond bigint timestamp conversion and comma-separated tag parsing.
frontend/src/components/SEOEntryFormModa: A modal dialog component for creating or editing SEO entries, with fields for page URL, target keywords, meta title, and meta description including character count warnings.
frontend/src/contexts/CartContext.tsx: React context provider that manages a shopping cart with localStorage persistence, exposing add, remove, update quantity, and clear operations along with totals.
frontend/src/data/masterPlans.ts: Defines and exports three static master pricing plans (Spark, Surge, Titan) with names, taglines, INR prices, colors, and feature lists.
frontend/src/data/seedServices.ts: Defines local TypeScript interfaces and exports a seed array of services (web dev, e-commerce, landing pages, etc.) with tiered packages, addons, and maintenance plans for initial data population.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes React Query hooks for backend data fetching and mutations covering leads, services (both stubbed out), and active backend entities like SEO entries, social media posts, email/ad campaigns, and landing pages.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Google Fonts, sets up Tailwind directives, and defines CSS custom properties and reusable component classes (glass cards, teal gradients, status badges, sidebar links) for the app's dark teal-themed design system.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with QueryClientProvider (React Query) and InternetIdentityProvider before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/AdsTrackerPage.tsx: Page component for managing paid ad campaigns across platforms (Google, Meta, LinkedIn, YouTube) with CRUD operations, platform filtering, and KPI summary cards for spend, clicks, CTR, and conversions.
Page component that lets users enter a keyword and generate AI-powered content (SEO blog post, social captions, LinkedIn post, Instagram carousel) via an AI API call, with copy and export functionality.
frontend/src/pages/AISmartSystemsPage.ts: Page component offering multiple AI-powered sales tools (service recommender, proposal generator, pricing strategy, closing scripts, follow-up messages) where users fill in fields and receive AI-generated outputs.
frontend/src/pages/AnalyticsEnginePage.t: Page component that generates GA4-style analytics reports for a selected date range, optionally posting to a webhook and displaying mock KPI cards and charts for sessions, users, revenue, and conversion rate.
frontend/src/pages/AutomationDashboardPa: Displays a dashboard of toggleable automation options (WhatsApp auto-reply, proposal sending, follow-ups, etc.) with on/off switches that persist state via automationConfig utilities. Shows a count of active automations and links to webhook configuration in settings.
frontend/src/pages/AutomationWorkflowsPa: Provides a UI to manually trigger predefined automation workflows (new lead, meeting, payment, analytics, content) by POSTing to a configured webhook URL. Displays per-workflow run status, results, and logs webhook calls.
frontend/src/pages/CampaignAutopilotPage: A campaign autopilot page that monitors ad campaign health (CTR/conversions), manages social media posting windows, configures health thresholds and summary schedules, and sorts posts by posting windows. Combines ad campaign data with social post data to generate automated performance summaries.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: A checkout page that displays cart items with quantity controls and processes payments via Razorpay, navigating to success or failure pages based on the result. Shows an empty-cart state if no items are present.
frontend/src/pages/ContentCalendarPage.t: Renders a monthly calendar grid showing scheduled social media posts per day, with support for creating and editing posts via a modal. Navigates between months and groups fetched posts by their scheduled date.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard page displaying lead/service stats, quick action navigation links, automation status, and recent webhook logs for the Quick Bee AI Growth Engine platform.
frontend/src/pages/DataExportPage.tsx: Data export page allowing users to download various data categories (leads, services, configs, logs) in multiple formats (JSON, CSV, Excel, PDF) via per-category format selectors and download buttons.
frontend/src/pages/DigitalMarketingAnaly: Analytics page aggregating ad campaign and email campaign data into KPI cards, a bar chart of ad spend/clicks by platform, and a pie chart of email campaign status distribution.
frontend/src/pages/EmailCampaignsPage.ts: CRUD management page for email marketing campaigns, showing status-grouped stats and a list of campaigns with create, edit, and delete actions via a modal form and confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/pages/ExternalToolsPage.tsx: Informational page listing external third-party tools (Zapier, Make, Buffer, etc.) with descriptions and use cases, plus a step-by-step guide for connecting them via webhooks.
Displays a page for receiving and inspecting external webhook logs, with options to refresh, clear all logs, expand individual log entries, and copy the webhook receiver endpoint URL.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPagesPage.tsx: Manages marketing landing pages with CRUD operations, displaying pages in a list with status badges (active/paused/draft) and summary stats, using a modal form for create/edit.
frontend/src/pages/LeadsPage.tsx: Provides a leads management interface with create, edit, and delete functionality, supporting grid and list views, status color coding, and a modal form for lead data entry.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Simple error page shown after a failed payment, offering buttons to retry checkout or navigate back to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Confirmation page shown after a successful payment that clears the cart, triggers a payment automation event, and displays a generated invoice reference number.
frontend/src/pages/SalesConfigPage.tsx: Configuration page for managing sales-related API keys and webhook URLs (OpenAI, WhatsApp, Razorpay, email, CRM, etc.) with toggle switches, secret masking, connection status badges, and webhook test functionality.
frontend/src/pages/SEOManagerPage.tsx: Manages SEO entries (meta titles, descriptions, keywords) for pages with CRUD operations, displaying stats on total pages, keywords, and fully optimized entries.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceManagementPage: Admin page for managing services with full CRUD operations, including a modal form for creating/editing services with packages (tiered pricing), add-ons, and visibility controls, plus drag-and-drop reordering and duplication support.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesCatalogPage.t: Customer-facing services catalog page that displays filterable service cards by category, with a preview modal for selecting package tiers, add-ons, and quantity before adding items to the cart.
frontend/src/pages/SmartTaskAgentPage.ts: AI-assisted task management page where users enter goals to auto-generate task lists, then track completion with priority/due-date editing, goal grouping, and next-task suggestions stored in local storage.
frontend/src/pages/SocialMetricsPage.tsx: Social media analytics dashboard that displays KPI totals and a bar chart aggregated by platform, with filterable metrics records (followers, impressions, reach, etc.) and full CRUD via modal forms.
frontend/src/pages/SocialSchedulerPage.t: Social media post scheduler page with list/grid view modes, platform and status filters, and full CRUD for posts (idea → draft → scheduled → published) using a form modal and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/WebhookLogsPage.tsx: Displays a filterable table of webhook log entries with options to refresh or clear logs, supporting filtering by tool name and success/error status.
frontend/src/utils/aiClient.ts: Sends chat completion requests to a configured AI API endpoint using credentials from salesConfig, logs each call via webhookLogger, and returns the assistant's response text.
frontend/src/utils/automationConfig.ts: Defines and persists a set of boolean automation feature flags (e.g., whatsappAutoReply, leadFollowUp) to localStorage with get/save helpers.
frontend/src/utils/automationTrigger.ts: Fires a POST webhook to the configured automation URL when a named automation is enabled, attaching event metadata and logging the result.
frontend/src/utils/campaignAutopilotStor: Manages localStorage persistence for Campaign Autopilot configuration including posting windows, health thresholds, and summary schedule, with helpers to add/remove windows and sort posts by schedule.
frontend/src/utils/downloadHelper.ts: Provides browser-side file download utilities for JSON, CSV, and Excel (SpreadsheetML) formats, flattening nested objects and handling BigInt serialization.
frontend/src/utils/mockAnalyticsData.ts: Generates randomized mock analytics data (sessions, users, revenue, traffic sources, top pages) for a given date range, used for UI development and testing.
frontend/src/utils/razorpayCheckout.ts: Dynamically loads the Razorpay SDK and opens a payment checkout modal using the configured Razorpay key, invoking success or failure callbacks based on the result.
frontend/src/utils/salesConfig.ts: Defines the SalesConfig interface with API credentials and feature toggle flags, persisting and retrieving the configuration from localStorage with default fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/taskStorage.ts: Provides localStorage persistence utilities for the Smart Task Agent, including CRUD operations for goals and tasks, task reordering, and a markTaskComplete function that suggests the next highest-priority incomplete task.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence helpers and a function to remove sensitive parameters from the URL hash without reloading.
frontend/src/utils/webhookLogger.ts: Manages a localStorage-backed log of webhook calls, storing up to 500 entries with metadata like tool name, URL, payload summary, status code, and success flag, with functions to add, retrieve, and clear logs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, extending the theme with custom fonts, OKLCH-based color tokens, teal/dark brand colors, border radii, box shadows, and enabling typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the overall project state including version, feature list with IDs and descriptions, architectural notes, and known issues for a digital marketing automation platform being built incrementally.
